== Description ==
Checks to see if a string is utf8 encoded.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php seems_utf8( $str ); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$str|string|The string to be checked}}

== Return Values ==
; (boolean) : True if <tt>$str</tt> fits a UTF-8 model, false otherwise.
